Install

pip install fwie

How to use

{% raw %} 
import numpy as np
from fwie.fwie import FWIe_calc

FWIe_calc(np.array([[50]]), np.array([[12]]))

100%|██████████| 1/1 [00:00<00:00, 2014.56it/s]

array([[61.7]])
{% endraw %}
